name: Nested Letters
description:
NESTED LETTERS is a word art experiment, created for Gameception Jam 2021! The theme was to make a "game within a game". I played with the idea of what it means to be "within" something else, and I wanted to make a short and fun series of scenes that might make you smile :) Also, you can make ducks smooch.

 

All of the art is made out of text characters. I wanted to learn how to use Super Text Mesh and I had so much fun coming up with creative experimentations. Check out the link below to get it for yourself!

 

Controls:

  • Mouse: Left click the scene until you discover something new
  • F1: Turns off jiggly animations (restart game to turn them back on)
  • Escape: Quits the game
  • You'll know you're done when you see "The End" :)

 

Credits:

  • Design, dev, art and sound effects by Miko Charbonneau
  • Made with Unity, Bolt and Super Text Mesh: https://kaiclavier.itch.io/super-text-mesh
  • Music: "Aronara" by http://www.nosoapradio.us/
  • Fonts: Caviar Dreams, Share Tech Mono, Poetsen One
